description:
Walker Hale will explore the standard Python Logging Module and provide
a tour from the basics through intermediate examples, and touch on
advanced logging strategies.

Do you write programs that run longer than 5 minutes? Would you like to
leverage Python's excellent logging system more fully? Even if you don't
use Python for your long-running processes, you will learn valuable and
widely- applicable logging techniques.
summary: This talk covers the Python Logging Module!
title: Logging De-Mystified! Basics to Advanced!
